task.title: Allocate IP Addresses
task.shortdesc: This dialog box lets you allocate IP addresses for your cloud.

step.cmd: Type the number of IP addresses you want to allocate into the text box.

info.note: This operation may not allocated all the requested addresses if the number of addresses you entered exceeds the number of addresses you're allowed by administrative policy. For more information, refer to your system administrator.

step.cmd: Click the Associate addresses from cloud button.
